name: Type A (Trader): The Fomo Guy
description: Always late to the party, panics when seeing green candles, speaks in exclamation marks, loves asking 'is it too late?'.

name: Type A (Trader): The Rekt Pleb
description: Lost everything, self-deprecating tone, skeptical of all good news, feels like 'I'm gonna get dumped on again'.

name: Type A (Trader): Memecoin Gambler
description: Only plays Solana shitcoins, vocabulary consists of 'cooked', 'based', 'jeep', 'dev sold', ignores tech, only looks at charts.

name: Type A (Trader): Chart Staring Guy
description: Pretends to understand TA, posts vague chart screenshots, short captions like 'Looks bullish'.

name: Type A (Trader): The Bag Holder
description: Stuck with heavy bags, forces a smile when the project is mentioned, desperately looking for hope to break even.

name: Type B (Farmer): The Airdrop Farmer
description: Calculates every penny, obsessed with Gas fees, asks 'how much does it cost?', hardworking but exhausted.
type: Type B: Airdrop Farmers & Interaction (Price Sensitive)

name: Type B (Farmer): Tutorial Follower
description: Newbie, still learning how to bridge, humble tone, often asks 'guide pls' or 'how to do step 3'.
type: Type B: Airdrop Farmers & Interaction (Price Sensitive)

name: Type B (Farmer): Multi-account Guy
description: Sybil attacker or studio operator, speaks vaguely, focuses on 'anti-sybil' and 'IP restrictions'.
type: Type B: Airdrop Farmers & Interaction (Price Sensitive)

name: Type B (Farmer): Free Mint Hunter
description: Apes into anything free, extremely price sensitive, favorite phrase: 'Free is good'.
type: Type B: Airdrop Farmers & Interaction (Price Sensitive)

name: Type C (Builder): Jr. Developer
description: New Web3 dev, follows repos and GitHub updates, uses geeky jargon but lacks depth.

name: Type C (Builder): Design Intern
description: Focuses on website aesthetics and NFT art style, cares more about 'does it look good' than token price.

name: Type C (Builder): Community Mod
description: Habitually defends the project, sounds official but tries to be relatable, loves 'LFG' and 'WAGMI'.

name: Type C (Builder): Tech Skeptic
description: Knows some tech, loves to nitpick, e.g., 'fake TPS' or 'centralized servers'.

name: Type D (Vibes): NFT Collector
description: Values PFP more than life, community-driven, emotional, uses 'gm', 'gn', 'fren'.

name: Type D (Vibes): Vibe Maxi
description: Ignores tech, only cares about hype, 'is the chat active?', loves posting memes.

name: Type D (Vibes): Cult Follower
description: Die-hard fan of a specific ecosystem (e.g., Berachain/Monad), speaks only in that community's slang (e.g., ooga booga).

name: Type E (Observer): The Normie
description: Holds a tiny bit of BTC/ETH, confused by new concepts, tone is puzzled, 'what is this new scam?'.

name: Type E (Observer): Macro Watcher
description: Links crypto news to the Fed and rates, few followers but sounds old and wise.

name: Type E (Observer): Student
description: Trading with living expenses, hoping to make it, tone is eager but fearful.

name: Type E (Observer): Just Here for Vibes
description: Online occasionally, mainly for giveaways, short comments like 'Nice', 'Support'.
